title: Drew
description: Falling for a girl I just met was never in my plans.We had one night together and most days I convince myself that she was an apparition—something I made up in my mind to get me through the hard days.Then I found her again.Only she wasn’t happy and smiling, giving me a hard time like she did the day we met.She was broken...unseeing eyes no longer filled with life.She was gone because of another person’s disregard for human life.That night devastated me—transformed me from a person who upheld the law to a man that broke it.My life was ruined, and all I had to fall back on was the Cerberus MC. Returning to the clubhouse breathed new life and determination into me.
author: Marie  James
